item.description: You've worked all week so take a break from cooking have some fun at an outdoor Happy Hour with Party Express. It goes from 5:00 pm to 6:00 pm. Stonebridge offers a complimentary buffet Fridays. It can include, wings, b-b-q chicken, chicken tenders, pasta, pizza, and cheese covered potatoes. Their will also be special drink prices. The outside water view is quite picturesque. Stop by for awhile for good coversation, free food, and reduced drink prices. Joint with the Southern Connecticut Dining out group.
item.how_to_find_us: Near the bar, not far from the food, outside, in back of the restaurant.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party Express goes to an Hour of Happy Hour at Stonebridge Restaurant
